title: 820-00928 died after screen change stuck at 1,200mA [SOLVED]
message:
I have a machine 820-00928-a that had a broken display, and I replaced its screen with a used screen in good condition. I needed to format it, I went through the whole process and left it until it was finished, when I went to check the machine it no longer showed an image with any other screen, it turns on, however, there is no chime, and its consumption is around 1,200 mA, any tips on where start evaluating, taking into account that it was functional.

I have some skill with electronics and maintenance and I followed everything carefully with the process on this MacBook, but the failure occurred during the system installation.

title: 820-00928 died after screen change stuck at 1,200mA [SOLVED]
message:
First of all, welcome to the forum!

Try DFU restore...

title: 820-00928 died after screen change stuck at 1,200mA [SOLVED]
message:
Thank you, my friend.

About DFU this machine is a 2017 I don't think it goes into DFU. I tried to do that, but I couldn't.

title: 820-00928 died after screen change stuck at 1,200mA [SOLVED]
message:
Sorry, I didn't get your model correctly.

Failing on update points to BIOS issue.
Try known good BIOS, cllean ME.
[URL unfurl="true"]https://drive.google.com/file/d/17JHZ_8HWZ7Aw3_IKO6zuotzfq4WjIhLv/view?usp=sharing[/URL]
[URL unfurl="true"]https://drive.google.com/file/d/1YKKdpd0DtpobU8OOCfcS21hrKN10yTUH/view?usp=sharing[/URL]
Let me know if at least one is good...

title: 820-00928 died after screen change stuck at 1,200mA [SOLVED]
message: I'll try it today and get back to you, thanks.

title: 820-00928 died after screen change stuck at 1,200mA [SOLVED]
message:
I came to give feedback, after re-recording the Bios chip the machine started working again. One more detail, the first rom you told me to clear had a password, so I tried to download another one and it worked. I'll share it here to help someone who needs it in the future.

Thank you very much for your help, the machine is working 100% again.

title: 820-00928 died after screen change stuck at 1,200mA [SOLVED]
